data.message: Happy Anniversary FB, thanks for helping me keep in touch with my family n friends, makes my day, and thanks !!!!!!

replies.message: You just made our day, Ruth. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to the rest of our team. -Abby

Hi Facebook , My friend's page was deleted (called Socrates International Honour Society Leiden), even though she was the president of that organization's chapter, and was the first person to start it. She was subsequently harassed to delete it by the other page owners who started the new page that was identical to hers (called "Socrates Leiden" https://www.facebook.com/Socrates.Leiden/?fref=ts). Now her page has been deleted for no reason without any warning due to "copyright infringement" even though she was the person who started the chapter! They are a copyright infringement of her page and she is very upset with Facebook! Please delete their page and bring her page back.
